info.description: ### API de um Fast Food para o Tech Challenge da FIAP - Fase 2
info.title: FIAP Tech Challenge Fase 2 - 10SOAT - G18

delete.description: Deletes a orderProduct by Order ID and Product ID

get.description: Search for a customer by ID
Search for a order by ID

put.description:
Update an existing order
The status are: **OPEN**, **CANCELLED**, **PENDING**, **RECEIVED**, **PREPARING**, **READY**, **COMPLETED**
## Transition of status:
- OPEN      -> CANCELLED || PENDING
- CANCELLED -> {},
- PENDING   -> OPEN || RECEIVED
- RECEIVED  -> PREPARING
- PREPARING -> READY
- READY     -> COMPLETED
- COMPLETED -> {}

patch.description:
Partially updates an existing order
The status are: **OPEN**, **CANCELLED**, **PENDING**, **RECEIVED**, **PREPARING**, **READY**, **COMPLETED**
## Transition of status:
- OPEN      -> CANCELLED || PENDING
- CANCELLED -> {},
- PENDING   -> OPEN || RECEIVED
- RECEIVED  -> PREPARING
- PREPARING -> READY
- READY     -> COMPLETED
- COMPLETED -> {}
